EditorData.AnimationTags: [ADAM] Halsin and player kiss again against the tree
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
[SCENE] The player nods. Halsin presses his whole body against theirs, kissing their neck. The camera rises away from them...

... above, the branches of the tree start to shake.

Text.Value: Do not misunderstand me. I want this.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [ADAM] Halsin is standing in bear form. Cocks his head.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Camera focuses on the player reacting with surprise as we hear Halsin turn into a bear off-screen. Once he's transformed, we see him standing on his hind legs, looking bashful. Camera returns to focus on the player as Halsin exits wildshape off-screen. Visual reference for transformations - Similar to DEN_GuardedEntrance_ParentsScene.

Text.Value: You're not wrong. This was a mistake.
Perhaps a little. Do you know how hard it's been for me to contain myself?
I'm not here to talk.
I need no further encouragement...

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Halsin's eyes very briefly flick downwards at himself as if implying offscreen arousal

Text.Value: I'm flattered I have that effect on you. Now come here.
Oh. If that's what you prefer, so be it.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [ADAM] Halsin and player kiss against the tree trunk
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Halsin seizes the player and presses them up against the trunk of a tree. He kisses them once again, then sinks to his knees, out of frame. The player gasps and keeps his head down with one hand. Offscreen, Halsin utters a muffled, animalistic growl. Halsin rises to his feet.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] The player is pushed against the tree. They kiss. Halsin goes down on the player. We cut to a wideshot where we see a squirrel run by. Cutting back to the action, Halsin gets back to his feet and kisses the player on the neck. They fall to the ground and the romance continues on the ground
EditorData.VFXTags: [MD] The player is pushed against the tree. They kiss. Halsin goes down on the player. We cut to a wideshot where we see a squirrel run by. Cutting back to the action, Halsin gets back to his feet and kisses the player on the neck. They fall to the ground and the romance continues on the ground

Text.Value: Just as nature intended. Come here to me -

EditorData.AnimationTags: [ADAM] Halsin looks excited/pleased, steps forward, but then hesitates.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Halsin's approving reaction CU to the player disrobing off-screen. He takes a step towards the player only to hesitate, as if sensing something.
EditorData.NodeContext: Horny awe. Breaks off at the end, as if sensing something (he's about to involuntarily transform into a bear, out of excitment).
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Halsin steps towards the player but stops. He falls to the ground and shapeshifts into a bear. After a moment he shapeshifts back into his regular form.
EditorData.VFXTags: [MD] Halsin steps towards the player but stops. He falls to the ground and shapeshifts into a bear. After a moment he shapeshifts back into his regular form.

Text.Value: You... like it?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Halsin had accidentilly transformed into a bear. He is now back in human form

Text.Value: Now that you say it, perhaps this was a mistake. I should leave.
Don't be frightened.
Yes you are. And you're perfect.

Text.Value: Come. Feel for yourself.
You came. I was concerned you might have had doubts. Or that this might have all been too soon...

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player finds Halsin waiting under a tree. He spots them, eager and a little relieved.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Player walking through the woods, finds Halsin standing by a tree.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [ADAM] Halsin rips his clothes off. Stands naked.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
[SCENE] He reaches with both hands towards the front of his own clothing and grips. Camera focuses on the player as there is a sudden off-screen rip of fabric. They gape, despite themselves.

Halsin stands before them, naked. He looks at the player like someone dying of thirst would look upon a mountain spring.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [ADAM] Players excited reation to Halsin appraoching in bear form
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Halsin takes a deep breath. Camera focuses on the player's face, excited-scared expression, like they're on a roller-coaster, as Halsin enters bear form offscreen. Their eyeline raises as the shadow of approaching bear-Halsin falls on them.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Halsin, again, shapeshifts into bear form. When turning into a bear he knocks the player over. The player sits up as bear Halsin approaches. The player strokes bear Halsin's head and then leans back as the bear walks forward on top of them
EditorData.VFXTags: [MD] Halsin, again, shapeshifts into bear form. When turning into a bear he knocks the player over. The player sits up as bear Halsin approaches. The player strokes bear Halsin's head and then leans back as the bear walks forward on top of them

Text.Value: Of course. What else do you think I'm here for?
Are you certain? It will be untamed, vigorous, and, well... large.

EditorData.NodeContext: Hesitant but into it. Player is expressing interest in having sex with him in his bear form (yes, really).

Text.Value: Ah... I see. Well, of course. Back to camp then.
More?
Nevertheless, I will be gentle.
Or at least I will try.
Yes. Change back again. Let me have the beast... and the beast have me.
Forgive me. I... lost the run of myself. Sometimes, if blood runs hot enough, it's difficult to tame the beast.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Halsin accidentilly transformed into a bear. He is now back in human form

Text.Value: I trust you.
Something to keep in mind for another night. But for now, come here.
More?
Why, is the big, strong Archdruid Halsin nervous? Adorable.
Actually... I spoke in haste. I think I should leave.
Almost frightened. If you feel my heart quicken, it's not from fear.
As have I. It's been worth the wait.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [ADAM] Squirrel keyframe anim of it rnning away after hearing Halsin roar
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] Nearby elsewhere, a squirrel scurries along  the undergrowth. It pauses and stares at something offscreen. Suddenly there's a loud bear roar and the squirrel flees into the night.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] We cut to a squirrel trying to eat an acorn on a nearby tree. Hearing the noises coming from the bear and the player, the squirrel looks up to see what the commotion is. Seeing and hearing the act that is occuring before them, the squirrel drops the accorn in shock and turns to run in fright when the bear roars loudly.
EditorData.VFXTags: [MD] We cut to a squirrel trying to eat an acorn on a nearby tree. Hearing the noises coming from the bear and the player, the squirrel looks up to see what the commotion is. Seeing and hearing the act that is occuring before them, the squirrel drops the accorn in shock and turns to run in fright when the bear roars loudly.

Text.Value: Just imagine we're back in the woods... and I'm your prey.
Large is what I'm here for.
As I do you. But nevertheless, I will be gentle.
As do you, I think.
Don't apologise. I like it.
Another time then, perhaps. Now come here...
I'm almost frightened to touch you - if I give in, I may not be able to stop until I have devoured you.

Text.Value: This was a mistake. I think I'd better get dressed...

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: [SCENE] He moves close to the player. They kiss fiercely. The player backs up out of frame to disrobe. Halsin watches hungrily.
EditorData.SFXTags: [MD] Halsin and the player kiss. The player walks behind a tree and undresses
EditorData.VFXTags: [MD] Halsin and the player kiss. The player walks behind a tree and undresses

Text.Value: Too soon? No - I've been waiting a long time for this.
Put your doubts aside. I'm here.
You don't have to do this.
Nor am I.

Synopsis: Romance with Halsin. The player meets Halsin in a quiet outdoor area (a city park/small grove, Somewhere with trees and greenery) once they've romantically bonded with him. A romance scene ensues. Halsin, aroused, briefly lapses into bear form. The player can encourage him to remain in that form or that of an elf.
